title: JazzCash’s preparations for BISP tranche disbursement reviewed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 11 (APP):Chairperson Benazir Income Support Programme (BISP), Rubina Khalid, along with Haaris Mahmood, Interim CEO of Mobilink Microfinance Bank and Arif Chaudhary, Head of Public Sector, on Thursday reviewed the seamless arrangements for the upcoming BISP tranche disbursement for registered deserving beneficiaries.
In February 2024, JazzCash was selected as one of the few prestigious financial institutions partnering with BISP to disburse funds aimed at empowering marginalized communities, said news release.
Under this three year partnership, JazzCash will facilitate cash withdrawals through biometrically enabled services, ensuring secure and efficient transactions.
This collaboration highlights JazzCash’s dedication to advancing financial inclusion and catalyzing Pakistan’s socio-economic development.
As a signatory of GSMA’s Connected Women Commitment Initiative, JazzCash has committed to increasing the proportion of women in their mobile money customer base, which currently stands at 30 percent.
